mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_member(login_id, name, password, gender, created_at) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{gender}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT to_char(member_id) AS member_id, LOGIN_ID, NAME, GENDER, to_char(created_at, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') AS created_at FROM study_member ORDER BY member_id
